Method.description: Recomended options EEG=<<openmeeg>> MEG=<<os_meg>>. Others options <<meg_sphere>> <<eeg_3sphereberg>> <<duneuro>>

method_type.name: openmeeg
method_type.description: Select the group and name of the sensor layout. See app/bst_default_anatomy.json file and select all params from there

method_type.name: os_meg
method_type.description: Use this configuration as anatomy template

KeepRatio.description: Default <<100>>. iso2mesh Percentage of elements kept (1-100%)

MergeMethod.description: iso2mesh <<mergemesh>>|<<mergesurf>> Function used to merge the meshes

VertexDensity.description: SimNIBS <<0.1 - X>> setting the vertex density (nodes per mm2)  of the surface meshes

NbVertices.description: SimNIBS Number of vertices for the cortex surface imported from CAT12

NodeShift.description: FieldTrip <<0 - 0.49>> Improves the geometrical properties of the mesh

Downsample.description: FieldTrip Integer, Downsampling factor to apply to the volumes before meshing

Zneck.description: Input T1/T2: Cut volumes below neck (MNI Z-coordinate)
